name: Solicitor Notice of Proceedings (court service inside UK) NOP ASE1
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant: ((applicant name))
Respondent: ((respondent name))
Issue date: ((issueDate))
Response due date: ((dueDate)) 
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

#Notice of proceedings

Dear ((solicitor name)) 

This ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)) application has been checked and issued. The court has served the documents on the respondent. 

#What happens next
A response is due by ((dueDate)). You will receive a notification when the response is received by the court. 

View the latest status and documents in your HMCTS account: ((signin url))

The applicant will be able to apply for a conditional order from ((date of response)).

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Notice of Proceedings: ((reference number))
